member.name: JOBOBJECT_NET_RATE_CONTROL_INFORMATION
member.summary: Contains information used to control the network traffic for a job. This structure is used by the and functions with the JobObjectNetRateControlInformation information class.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_NET_RATE_CONTROL_INFORMATION.MaxBandwidth
member.summary: The maximum bandwidth for outgoing network traffic for the job, in bytes.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_NET_RATE_CONTROL_INFORMATION.ControlFlags
member.summary: A combination of enumeration values that specify the scheduling policy for network rate control.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_NET_RATE_CONTROL_INFORMATION.DscpTag
member.summary: The value to use for the Differentiated Service code point (DSCP) field to turn on network quality of service (QoS) for all outgoing network traffic generated by the processes of the job object. The valid range is from 0x00 through 0x3F. For information about DSCP, see Differentiated Services.
